sentences.en: A jobbing process is chosen to meet the one _ off or small _ order requirements of customers.
sentences.cn: 零工生产过程工艺是为了满足顾客一次性或少量订货的要求.

sentences.en: If you must go in for stock - jobbing, you'll have to drop the factories.
sentences.cn: 要做公债, 就不要办厂!

sentences.en: One of the method of curbing plate bending in jobbing sheet rolling process was researched.
sentences.cn: 研究了在中板轧制过程中抑制板坯弯曲的措施之一.

sentences.en: Opaque ink: Ink with high opacity for jobbing work.
sentences.cn: 不透明墨: 碎件印刷用的遮盖力强油墨.

sentences.en: There Dr Kevorkian painted, wrote, played the flute and made a film about Handel's "Messiah", while earning a meager living as a jobbing pathologist.
sentences.cn: 在加利福尼亚，在当打零工的病理学家赚取微薄生计的同时，他画画、写作、吹笛子，还拍了一部关于韩德尔的“弥赛亚”的电影。

sentences.en: Usually retained for use as pads or other jobbing works.
sentences.cn: 可保留作拍子部或其他碎件用.

phrases.tran_cn: 干某一工作；从事某一职业
好运；幸运的事情；干的不错
就业市场；工作市场；求职广场
寻找工作；职位搜索；工作搜寻

trans.tran_en: working on occasional jobs or by the piece rather than in a regular job

trans.tran_cn: 批购（货物）转卖给零售商；做零工（job的ing形式）
